description:
People in Edmonds, Washington, trust The Tucker Law Firm to provide compassionate legal assistance and aggressive representation. We understand that any type of injury accident, whether it involves vehicles, medical mistakes or dangerous products, causes emotional and financial stress as well as physical damages. Our team treats clients with respect and kindness, and we are dedicated to fighting for the compensation due to them.

Negligence in any form creates the potential for harm, but some careless actions are more dangerous than others. Our legal team pursues justice in these types of negligence cases:

• Car, truck and motorcycle crashes

• Mass transit and aviation accidents

• Traumatic brain injuries

• Surgical, diagnostic and other medical mistakes

• Birth injuries

• Defective products

• Dangerous drugs and medical devices

• Motor vehicle defects

• Property hazards

• Animal attacks

People who have sustained injuries due to reckless or violent behavior, such as assault and battery or nursing home abuse, need more than compensation. They deserve justice. Our goal is to hold people accountable and liable for the harm they have caused. We also handle wrongful death cases and bad faith insurance claims, and we pursue compensation for railroad workers who sustain injuries on the job as well.

The Tucker Law Firm invites injured people to schedule a free consultation with us at our office or by virtual appointment.
